title: 5G patent fight continues as judge sets date for Apple v. Ericsson trial
content:
Amidst the ongoing 5G patent battle between Apple and Ericsson, a Texas Judge has settled on a court date of June 2023. According to FOSS Patents, there will be a scheduling conference on March 16 between the twoâ€™s attorneys. This is later than Apple had hoped, as it proposed a December 2022 trial.

more…

The post 5G patent fight continues as judge sets date for Apple v. Ericsson trial appeared first on 9to5Mac.
